ModMetaData.name: Beam me up Scotty Src
ModMetaData.author: Gouda quiche
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a teleport bench and its tiles to stand on.
Buildings : - Tp workstation : at least 1 is needed. It will give orders to tp spots. - Mini station : smaller workstation. - Tp spot : build it close to the workstation and choose the way it works. It is also a storage, meaning you can prioritize what pawns will put on it. You can choose to automate teleportation and the way it goes : in, out, swap. - Tp catcher : cheap wooden building that you can link to a tp spot. It is a storage. A pawn or any object standing on it will be teleported. - Tp bed : cheap building that allows to teleport wounded, incapacitated or captured pawns. - Tp box : same but for animals.
Howto : - Build tp workstation (power required) - Build tp spot in workstation range (power required) - Build tp catcher - Link the tp spot to the tp catcher with a colonist - Select tp spot, choose the way the spot teleports. - Select workstation to start it up. You can browse different tp spots within range. - Cast teleportation with workstation. Alternatively, you can choose to teleport automatically.
Travel between maps : - Link the spots before you travel. - Uninstall the spot that does not require power. - Carry the spot in caravan. - Reinstall. - ??? - Profit.
